document_data.mainbody: '''Creation domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with creation-related [[spell]]s and powers.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[create or destroy water]]'', ''[[minor image]]'', and ''[[create food and water]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[minor creation]]'', ''[[major creation]]'', and ''[[heroes' feast]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[permanent image]]'', ''[[true creation]]'', and either ''[[genesis]]''{{cite book/Deities and Demigods|213}}{{cite book/Defenders of the Faith|78}} or, more likely, ''[[pavilion of grandeur]]''.
